The game’s graphics are also quite good, the monsters are designed in great detail and vividly, making the battles more realistic than ever. However, sometimes players may feel a bit overwhelmed because too many monsters appear on the screen.

  • Intense action-packed: At the beginning of the game, you will be quite chill, but later on, the monsters will be more crowded, and then the player needs to concentrate more to survive.
  • Satisfying player progression: Players can easily see their character developing through each stage, which makes them feel satisfied.
  • Skill-testing challenge: Your skills will be tested to the limit in survival mode Because now, besides skills, nothing can help you survive longer.
